effect.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.
effect.full: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.

description.sun-moon: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
